CoursePage.AboutInstructorText: An Egyptian doctor, graduated from the Faculty of Medicine, Ain Shams University in 1982. He is a professor and trainer of Metahealth and Vice President of the International Meta-Madison Association (IMMA®) in the United States of America (formerly). Metahealth is a new perspective on medicine that stems from the perspective of healing, not disease. The first and only doctor in the Arab world who relies on a therapeutic and training perspective in diagnosing and treating his clients based on diagnosing the soul with colors and diagnosing the disease with the psychological cause (subjective feelings). He has had Metahealth since 2012 until now. Founder of Classification Medicine. He established Classification Medicine in 2019 after more than 7 years of research and experiments that continue to develop and teach until now. He relied on the method of diagnosis and treatment by accurately identifying disturbed feelings that cause shocks that end in organic and psychological diseases. These disorders are identified using multiple techniques that he practices in his clinic in Cairo and also began teaching them to students of this science.
